duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and support the building of desirable, feasible, viable, and sustainable products that meet customer needs over the product-market lifecycle.
Partner with Business Stakeholders, Architecture, and Engineering teams to ensure alignment to Business Strategies, Technical Roadmaps, and Architectural standards.
Evolve lean and agile process, operationalize product management workflows, and practice consultative partnership to analyze customer feedback.
Craft a well-articulated global product vision, domain strategy, and long-range roadmap for the portfolio.
Generate business value and track the success of products, identifying areas for improvement. Create strategies for risk mitigation and contingency planning at the portfolio/program level.
Manage and mentor a team of skilled and engaged product owners at various levels of seniority.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent in IT or business with functional work experience. (Master's preferred)
